review_data.title: terrible
review_data.content: its a doner kebab place so if you like this stuff after a few beers then fine, but its poor food and I question its freshness. place is also marginal in terms of cleanliness

review_data.title: Delicious food, friendly staffs
review_data.content: Delicious food. Different types of food, very good kebab. Friendly staffs. Price is high than any other place in Europe. Located in the city center.

review_data.title: Cheap and good arabic food
review_data.content: As you may know, Zurich is an expensive city and eat there couldn't be different. Arab food is a cheap and a delicious choice in this town. This restaurant is located in a great neighborhood, Zurich West. There is public transportation all around. The menu...More

review_data.title: Der teuerste, aber nicht der beste Kebab in Zürich

review_data.title: Great kebab at reasonable price
review_data.content: We walked upon this place and decided to go in as the price was right. We were pleasantly surprised when the staff spoke to us in perfect unaccented English. The kebabs were very good. I would definitely recommend this restaurant.

review_data.title: Everything average
review_data.content: Everything is average. The service and friendliness of the staff, the Kebab, the space to eat. The price of the food is not in comparison with the food. It it too expensive.

review_data.title: Late night stop
review_data.content: Needed to soak up the beer after going straight out from work watching the Euro's. Great place for a spicy meat filled pick me up.

review_data.title: Gut, allerdings auch teuer

review_data.title: Cash only, friendly and prompt service, reliably good kebabs
review_data.content: This is one of the favourites amongst our friends. Cash only, nice enough guys, will make it properly spicy for you if you ask (which I like!). I like their kebabs better than New Point, as do my friends.

review_data.title: Good, cheat meal at any time of the day
review_data.content: Escherswyss Kebab is located in ZuriWest and accessed by public transit Tram #4. They open around 7am and stay until 03-04am in the morning. The place has a few sidewalk tables, a rear patio seating area and inside it’s mostly padded booths and a few...More

review_data.content: Ist ganz ok, aber nichts besonderes - wie leider die meisten Kebab-Buden in Zürich. Um rasch Mittag zu essen oder...More

review_data.title: Good Kebabs and falafel
review_data.content: Escherwyss Kebab is located next to New Point and offers turkish food like kebab, falafel, pide and hot sandwiches. I found the quality of the food good, actually better than the ones from New Point next door.
